cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SI, cs.CYBER, cs.HC. 

The paper proposes a gamification approach for smart building infrastructure to motivate human occupants towards energy efficiency. This involves human interaction in the context of cyber-physical systems, which suggests a focus on artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG) techniques. The paper also discusses the creation of an interface for building managers to interact with occupants, which falls under the category of social and information networks (cs.SI). Additionally, the paper discusses the importance of human-centric building services and amenities, which suggests a focus on cybersecurity (cs.CYBER) and human-computer interaction (cs.HC).
